about_the_game:
Jumpstart your Mrs.Santa's gift hunt with this extra goodies pack!


You'll get access to the DLC chest next to Santa's house that contains.

  • 3 Cocoas
  • 2 Eggnogs
  • 1 Eye Drop
  • REAL Sword
  • Wild Branch, unique weapon for Frosty that increases his magical powers
  • 100 Gold

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
